translations: （尤指难闻的）气味，臭味；意味，迹象；名声

sentences.sentence: Elaborate precautions were taken to prevent the foraging team using odour clues.
sentences.translation: 为了防止觅食队伍利用气味线索，他们采取了周密的预防措施。

sentences.sentence: "It smells like…," we have to say when describing an odour, struggling to express our olfactory experience.
sentences.translation: 形容一种气味时，我们不得不说“它闻起来就像…”，从而努力地表达我们的嗅觉体验。

sentences.sentence: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.translation: 他强烈地觉察到了烹调油的味道。
